hero.title: Your Data Lake. Your AI Workforce.
hero.lead: Empower your organization with autonomous AI agents that understand your data. Secure, multi-tenant, and built for enterprise scale.
hero.subtext: Transform raw data into actionable intelligence. Solve complex problems with AI agents that work 24/7.
hero.subHighlight: The modern operating system for data-driven organizations.

governedDataProducts.title: Unified Data Lake
governedDataProducts.description: Centralize all your data in a secure, governed lakehouse. Support for structured and unstructured data with enterprise-grade security.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: Autonomous AI Agents
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Deploy specialized agents that understand your business context. From data analysis to complex workflow automation, agents handle the heavy lifting.

agenticAutomation.title: Multi-Tenant Organizations
agenticAutomation.description: Built for scale. Manage multiple teams, departments, or clients with strict data isolation and granular access controls.

items.label: Data Teams
items.description: Free your data engineers from endless SQL queries. Let AI agents handle routine data retrieval and analysis, allowing your team to focus on infrastructure and strategy.

items.label: Business Users
items.description: Empower non-technical users to get answers instantly. Ask questions in plain English and get visualized results without waiting for a ticket to be resolved.

items.label: Enterprise IT
items.description: Maintain full control with role-based access, audit logs, and tenant isolation. Deploy with confidence knowing your data is secure and compliant.

features.heading: Core Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build a data-driven organization.

connectEverySource.title: Data Ingestion & Management
connectEverySource.description: Seamlessly ingest data from various sources. Manage datasets, schemas, and metadata in a centralized catalog.

semanticControlPlane.title: Agentic Workflows
semanticControlPlane.description: Design and deploy complex workflows using Temporal. Orchestrate multiple agents to solve intricate business problems reliably.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Organization Management
agentAutomationStudio.description: Create and manage tenants for different departments or clients. Ensure data isolation and customize settings for each organization.

lakehouse.heading: Solving Real Business Problems
lakehouse.description: Move beyond dashboards. Implement solutions that drive action.

unifiedGovernance.title: The Bottleneck Problem
unifiedGovernance.description: Traditional data teams are overwhelmed with requests. AgentProvision removes this bottleneck by enabling self-service through AI agents.

programmablePipelines.title: The Context Gap
programmablePipelines.description: Generic AI doesn't know your business. Our Agent Kits are tailored to your specific data and domain, providing accurate and relevant insights.

compliantCollaboration.title: The Trust Issue
compliantCollaboration.description: Black-box AI is risky. We provide full visibility, citations, and audit trails so you can trust the decisions made by your AI agents.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Speed to Insight
adaptiveGuardrails.description: Reduce time-to-answer from days to seconds. Accelerate decision-making across the entire organization.

explainableDecisions.title: Operational Efficiency
explainableDecisions.description: Automate repetitive tasks and workflows. Free up human capital for high-value strategic work.

lakehouseSignals.title: Scalable Governance
lakehouseSignals.description: Grow your data initiatives without losing control. Manage access and security at scale across multiple tenants.

architecture.heading: Enterprise Architecture
architecture.description: Built on a robust, scalable foundation.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Data Layer
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Secure storage, efficient processing (DuckDB), and seamless integration with your existing data sources.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: Orchestration Layer
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: Temporal-powered workflows ensure reliability, retries, and state management for long-running processes.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: Intelligence Layer
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Advanced LLM integration (Claude, GPT) with context-aware agents that can reason, plan, and execute tasks.

ai.heading: Agent Capabilities
ai.description: What your AI workforce can do.

insightCopilots.title: Data Analysis Agents
insightCopilots.description: Analyze trends, generate reports, and visualize data on command. Like having a dedicated data analyst available 24/7.

composableSkills.title: Operational Agents
composableSkills.description: Trigger workflows, update records, and send notifications based on data insights. Close the loop from insight to action.

closedLoopActuators.title: Custom Agent Kits
closedLoopActuators.description: Build and deploy specialized agent kits tailored to your unique business needs and workflows.

roadmap.heading: Future Innovation
roadmap.subtitle: Continuously evolving to meet your needs.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Expanded Integrations
marketplaceConnectors.description: More native connectors for CRM, ERP, and Marketing platforms.

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: Advanced Reasoning
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Next-generation agents with enhanced planning and problem-solving capabilities.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Global Scale
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: Multi-region deployment options and enhanced enterprise compliance features.

testimonials.heading: Trusted by Innovators
testimonials.subtitle: See how organizations are transforming with AgentProvision

items.quote: AgentProvision allowed us to scale our data operations without hiring more staff. The multi-tenant features are perfect for managing our diverse client base.
items.author: CTO

items.quote: The ability to automate complex workflows with Temporal and AI agents has been a game-changer. We've reduced manual reporting time by 90%.
items.author: Head of Operations

cta.heading: Ready to Transform Your Organization?
cta.description: Experience the power of autonomous AI agents. Start your journey towards a more efficient, data-driven future today.
